Project Summary

Coffee-table volume on the history of timekeeping (part-translation) A volume describing the evolution of timekeeping through history, from the sundial to the wristwatch (publication date: 2015) History
French-to-Italian Phrasebook for Online Language Courses A repertoire of phrases, expressions, dialogues, descriptions and everyday situations for an online language course. Education / Pedagogy

Transcription, translation and adaptation of an 11-min marketing video The transcribed video, a TV programme focusing on the performance of an Italian confectionery product on an Asian country's marketplace, had to be translated into Italian and adapted for voiceover. Marketing / Market Research
POS material POS-specific set of documents Retail

Guided tour of corporate museum Translation for a guided tour of a private museum owned by a world-renowned corporation, describing exhibits, production techniques, product ranges, company history... Tourism & Travel
Renoir: la vie en peinture Catalogue published for an exhibition of works by Pierre-Auguste Renoir. Art, Arts & Crafts, Painting
Group of Ad Messages Directed to Brand Users Communication pages advertising skin care product lines to selected clients Advertising / Public Relations
Bottega Veneta Coffee-table volume about global brand Bottega Veneta made up of short-story-like contributions by leading international fashion journalists. Journalism
Catalogue of Luxury Items Individual descriptions of new designs by a global luxury brand. Advertising / Public Relations

Luca Signorelli Part-translation of the official catalogue of an exhibition about Italian Renaissance painter Luca Signorelli, with essays and descriptions of exhibits (drawings and paintings) by renowned international experts including Tom Henry and Claire Van Cleave. Art, Arts & Crafts, Painting
Bicycle Manufacturer's Website Website of a bicycle manufacturer including technicalities, marketing, advertising, and a touch of legal vocab. Sports / Fitness / Recreation
Marketing Questionnaire on Cigarette Brands Marketing tracker about smoking habits and cigarette brand awareness/loyalty Marketing / Market Research

PR and Marketing Material for a Renowned Worldwide Brand Transcreation of advertising and promotional material (product descriptions; headings; copy...) for a worldwide luxury brand, to be used on the corporate magazine and other marketing-related material. Advertising / Public Relations
Marketing Survey Questionnaire Marketing survey questionnaire about drinking habits & attitudes. Marketing / Market Research
Eight-page folder Eight-page folder introducing a master chocolatier and some of his chocolate-based recipes. Food & Drink

Master's Program Application Documents Four documents--formal letter; recommendation letter; statement of purpose; statement of research purpose--to apply to an Italian Master's program in Food Studies. Education / Pedagogy
Architectural Project Description Short article for an architecture magazine about the renovation of a public space into a private dwelling. Architecture
Press Release and Web Content Sculptor's exhibition press release and artist's web content. Art, Arts & Crafts, Painting
Press Release and Profiles Press release and profiles of candidates and jury members of an international food-related contest. Journalism
Small translation for a painter's catalogue Introduction to a contemporary painter's work Art, Arts & Crafts, Painting
Website content Hotel online reservation system Tourism & Travel
Higher education document Strategic plan of a US-based urban planning and public management college. Education / Pedagogy
University journal translations Translation of academic articles published in four issues of a university journal between 2006 and 2008. Journalism
Articles for Monthly Science Magazine A number of articles (volcanology, rewewable energy, synthetic food, the Earth) for a monthly science magazine. Journalism

Product Catalogues Translation (general information, including product descriptions, materials, technical refs...) and transcreation (copy for each line and each item) of a product catalogue including collectors' items, jewellery, stationery, fashion accessories, homeware... textAfterTable: More Less Payment methods accepted Wire transfer Portfolio Sample translations submitted: 11 English to Italian: On Sustainability / Riflessioni sulla sostenibilità (published translation, 2008) General field: Other Detailed field: Environment & Ecology Source text - English (...) In 1987 the Brundtland Report stated that: "sustainable development is development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs”. This definition, according the report, contained within it two key concepts, one was concerned with essential needs of the world's poor; the other with technological limitations. (...) If a strictly anthropocentric view of sustainability is “meaningless” then what of an ecocentric perspective that sees humans as just one element in a shared universe? (...) If we accept the definition of sustainable development as caring for the needs of the world’s poor as a priority, then we can’t ask the poor, in the same breath, to ignore their own needs and accept that we care more about the survival of rainforests or threatened species than we care
